definitions.definition: A yard to the rear of a house or similar residence .
A person's neighborhood , or an area nearby to a person's usual residence or place of work and where the person is likely to go.
definitions.label_groups: Australia , Canada , New Zealand , US , colloquial

definitions.definition: An area nearby to a country or other jurisdiction's legal boundaries, particularly an area in which the country feels it has an interest.
definitions.label_groups: Australia , Canada , New Zealand , US , colloquial

main_definition: ( Australia , Canada , New Zealand , US ) A yard to the rear of a house or similar residence .
